## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/trailingobjectsbase/overloadtoken">OverloadToken</a>&#39;s purpose is to allow specifying function overloads for different types, without actually taking the types as parameters.

(Necessary because member function templates cannot be specialized, so overloads must be used instead of specialization.)

Definition at line 88 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/trailingobjects-h">TrailingObjects.h</a>.

</DoxygenPage>
